trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

action.name: Beast's Strike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 2} plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage (your choice when you summon the beast). If the beast moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target before the hit, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the same type, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition if it is a Large or smaller creature.
